module.name: ECScale

element.name: TCustomECScale
element.descr: You can use this class as a subclass for your own visual components.
element.short: Base class for TECScale and TECRulerScale. No abstract methods, no published properties.

element.name: TCustomECScale.Correction
element.short: Correction of the scale values.
element.descr:
TECScale is based on double-precision values. Sometimes, exact calculation may result to a scale 0,001..100 and tick 0 would not be displayed. In this case can be Correction set to 0,01 and tick 0 will be displayed although the ruler or the slider where this scale is placed on can never reach this value.
So the Correction is here mainly because of design.

element.name: TCustomECScale.DateTimeFormat
element.short: Format of values. For ValueFormat = esvfDate or esvfTime only.

element.name: TCustomECScale.Digits
element.short: Number of digits. Depends on ValueFormat.
element.descr: case ValueFormat of esvfAutoRound: numbers of decimal places (i.e. 10,000 for Digits = 3) esvfFixedRound: numbers of decimal places (i.e. 10,000 for Digits = 3) esvfSmartRound: numbers of decimal places (i.e. 10,50 for Digits = 3) esvfExponential: number of digits of exponent (i.e. 1,00E+001 for Digits = 3) esvfHexadecimal: numbers of digits (i.e. 00A for Digits = 3) esvfMarkHexadec: numbers of digits (i.e. $00A for Digits = 3) esvfOctal: numbers of digits (i.e. 036 for Digits = 3) esvfBinary: numbers of digits (i.e. 1100100 for Digits = 7) esvfDate: does not affect esvfTime: does not affect esvfText: does not affect

element.name: TCustomECScale.FontOrientation
element.short: Orientation of values (0-3600, 900 ~ 90 degrees)

element.name: TCustomECScale.LogarithmBase
element.short: Only for ScaleType = estLogarithmic.

element.name: TCustomECScale.ScaleType
element.short: Scale can be estLinear or estLogarithmic

element.name: TCustomECScale.Text
element.short: Text can be used instead of values. Values are then indexes of TStringList.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickAlign
element.short: Alignment of the ticks. Can be etaOuter, etaInner, etaCenter

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickColor
element.short: Color of the ticks. clDefault is clBtnText. Only for TickDesing = etdSimple or etdThick.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickDesign
element.short: Design of ticks. Can be: etdSimple, etdThick, etd3DLowered, etd3DRaised

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickIndent
element.short: Indent of ticks. Distance of ticks from the edge of component or from the groove of ECSlider.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickLength
element.short: Length of the long ticks. Medium ticks are 0.7 of this value. Short ticks are 0.5 of this value.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickLongValue
element.short: Common divisor for long ticks. Only long ticks can have value. Default is 10. For range 0..100 will exist long ticks 0, 10, 20, ... 90, 100.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickMiddleValue
element.short: Common divisor for middle ticks. Default is 5.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickShortValue
element.short: Common divisor for short ticks. Default is 1.

element.name: TCustomECScale.TickVisible
element.short: Visibility of ticks (short, middle, long).

element.name: TCustomECScale.ValueDisplay
element.short: Displaying of the values.

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdNormal
element.short: Value is centered to tick (horizontaly in case of horizontal scale).

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdTopLeft
element.short: Values are aligned to the left from tick (in case of horizontal scale).

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdBottomRight
element.short: Values are aligned to the right from tick (in case of horizontal scale).

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdTopLeftInside
element.short: Values are aligned to the left from tick (in case of horizontal scale).

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdBttmRightInside
element.short: Values are aligned to the right from tick (in case of horizontal scale).

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdCompactTopLeft
element.short: Behaves like evdTopLeftInside in case of horizontal scale. In case of vertical scale are values separated to digits and diplayed as a column.

element.name: TValueDisplay.evdCompactBttmRight
element.short: Behaves like evdBttmRightInside in case of horizontal scale. In case of vertical scale are values separated to digits and diplayed as a column.

element.name: TValueDisplay
element.short: Enumeration denoting displaying values of the scale.
element.descr:
Position of the values also influe:
ValueIndent: distance form tick (vertical in case of horizontal scale)
ValueShift: distance ( -/+) from centered position (horizontal in case of horizontal scale)

element.name: TCustomECScale.ValueIndent
element.short: Distance between ticks and values.

element.name: TCustomECScale.ValueShift
element.short: Shift (in pixels) from the acccurate position.

element.name: TScaleType
element.short: Enumeration denoting type of a scale.

element.name: TECScale
element.short: Class is used as a subclass of TECSlider, TECProgressBar and TECPositionBar or third party visual components.

element.name: TTickAlign
element.short: Enumeration denoting aligning of the ticks. etaInner means aligning to the groove of a slider or to the edge of a ruler.

element.name: TTickSize
element.short: Enumeration denoting length of the tick. Private type.

element.name: TTickMetrics
element.short: Record containing position and size of the tick. Private type.

element.name: TTicksVisible
element.short: Enumeration denoting visibility of the ticks (short, middle, long).

element.name: TScaleValueFormat
element.short: Enumeration denoting format of the values.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfAutoRound
element.short: Automatic round.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfFixedRound
element.short: Fixed number of decimal places.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfSmartRound
element.short: Advanced rounding.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfMarkHexadec
element.short: Hexadecimal numbers with $ prefix.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfOctal
element.short: Octal numbers.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfBinary
element.short: Binary numbers.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfDate
element.short: Date.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfTime
element.short: Time.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfHexadecimal
element.short: Hexadecimal numbers.

element.name: TScaleValueFormat.esvfExponential
element.short: Decimal numbers with exponent.

element.name: TCustomECScale.OnPrepareValue
element.short: Triggered before the value is painted. Enables user-defined formating.

element.name: TCustomECScale.ValueVisible
element.short: Visibility of values (none, bound, regular, all).

element.name: TCustomECScale.ValueFormat
element.short: Format of values (round, hexadecimal, date, time, ... ).

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetStringMax
element.short: Returns string representation of maximum (Max). Applies correct formatting.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetStringMin
element.short: Returns string representation of minimum (Min). Applies correct formatting.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetPreferredWidth
element.short: Returns preferred width (or height) needed to draw a scale. Width for vertical scales, height for horizontal.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetStringPosition
element.short: Returns string representation of current position. Applies correct formatting.

element.name: TCustomECScale.SetScaleBounds
element.short: Sets bounds of the scale.
element.descr: This method must be called before GetPreferredWidth(), CalcTickPosAndValues() and Draw().

element.name: TCustomECScale.CalcTickPosAndValues
element.short: Calculates positions of ticks and values. Must be called before Draw().

element.name: TCustomECScale.Draw
element.short: Draws the scale on canvas. CalcTickPosAndValues() must be called before.

module.short: Class TECScale. Not a component but can draw itself to any canvas.

element.name: TCustomECScale.BeginUpdate
element.short: Increases UpdateCount. Helps to reduce repaints when more than one design property is changed at a time.

element.name: TCustomECScale.EndUpdate
element.short: Decreases UpdateCount.

element.name: TCustomECScale.UpdateCount
element.short: Update counter. Repaint via Redraw or RecalcRedraw is possible only if UpdateCount = 0.

element.name: TCustomECScale.Max
element.short: Maximum of the scale.

element.name: TCustomECScale.Min
element.short: Minimum of the scale.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetPreferredSize
element.short: Returns the minimal required size (width or height) [pixels] that TECScale needs to be fully displayed.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetPreferredValuesHeight
element.short: Returns the minimal required height [pixels] that values of TECScale need to be fully displayed.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetPreferredValuesWidth
element.short: Returns the minimal required width [pixels] that values of TECScale need to be fully displayed.

element.name: TCustomECScale.GetTextSize
element.short: Measures size (width or height) [pixels] that the string AStrVal will occupy on the canvas ACanvas.
